title: Nasus Q bug

embed.description: watch the Q animation at about the 8 second mark. This happened to me in a ranked game today. -- Watch live at http://www.twitch.tv/sir52

body: Currently in patch 5.17 nasus has a bug where his q animation will freak out and not go off or delay the auto can a riot team member confirm wither (pun intended) or not it has been noticed

replies.body: I started playing Nasus three days ago. This bug occured to me more than once. It tends to happen more often when you miss your Q and try to target something else. Sometimes the animation gets stuck for around 3 seconds. I thought this was just me not being able to use Nasus his mechanics properly.
